spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but door orientations in the master bedroom and bedroom 2 are mirrored or incorrectly swung compared to source. Window placement on the right-hand wall for bedroom 3 is missing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Most rooms are present, but the 'Utility' balcony behind the kitchen is partially truncated/rendered as a solid wall. Service room walls are simplified.

furniture_mapping.notes: High correlation in furniture layout, particularly the dining area and master bedroom. Some scale issues with the armchairs in the living area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric lighting and clean geometry. Soft shadows provide good depth, though some wall intersections have minor artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Master bedroom door swing orientation is clockwise in 3D but counter-clockwise in 2D plan.
Missing window on the east wall of Bedroom 3.
Utility area proportions are distorted, losing the depth indicated in the floor plan.
Rendering artifact at the foyer entrance where wall thickness appears inconsistent with internal partitions.
